tags.name: CalendarService
tags.description: CalendarService contains methods to create, edit delete calendar meetings

tags.name: ErrorService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to get localized errors

tags.name: FileService
tags.description:
Contains methods to import and upload files into the Files section of the
 conference room and the personal drive of any USER

tags.name: GroupService
tags.description:
The Service contains methods to login and create hash to directly enter
 conference rooms, recordings or the application in general

tags.name: InfoService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to get info about the system

tags.name: NetTestService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to trigger a network test

tags.name: RecordingService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to work with recordings

tags.name: RoomService
tags.description: RoomService contains methods to manipulate rooms and create invitation hash

tags.name: UserService
tags.description:
The Service contains methods to login and create hash to directly enter
 conference rooms, recordings or the application in general

tags.name: WbService
tags.description: WbService contains methods to manipulate whiteboard contents

post.description: Adds a new ROOM like through the Frontend

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description: Method to clean room white board (all objects will be purged) - Deprecated use WbService#resetWb method instead

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description:
Method to remotely close rooms. If a room is closed all users
 inside the room and all users that try to enter it will be redirected to
 the redirectURL that is defined in the ROOM-Object.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the room id

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description: Returns the count of users currently in the ROOM with given id

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: roomid
parameters.description: roomId id of the room to get users

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

post.description: Method to get invitation hash with given parameters

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: invite
parameters.description: parameters of the invitation

parameters.name: sendmail
parameters.description: flag to determine if email should be sent or not

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description: Kick all uses of a certain room

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the room id

200.description: true if USER was kicked, false otherwise

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description: kick external USER from given room

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the room id

parameters.name: externalType
parameters.description: external type of USER to kick

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: external id of USER to kick

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description:
Method to remotely open rooms. If a room is closed all users
 inside the room and all users that try to enter it will be redirected to
 the redirectURL that is defined in the ROOM-Object.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the room id

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description:
Returns an Object of Type RoomsList which contains a list of
 ROOM-Objects. Every ROOM-Object contains a Roomtype and all informations
	about that ROOM. The List of current-users in the room is Null if you get
	them via SOAP. The Roomtype can be 'conference', 'presentation' or 'interview'.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of public rooms need to be retrieved

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description: Returns list of users currently in the ROOM with given id

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: roomid
parameters.description: roomId id of the room to get users

200.description: List of users in the room

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the room id

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

delete.description: Delete a room by its room id

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the room

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description:
Checks if a room with this exteralId + externalType does exist,
	if yes it returns the room id if not, it will create the room and then
	return the room id of the newly created room

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type of the room

parameters.name: externaltype
parameters.description: you can specify your system-name or type of room here, for example "moodle"

parameters.name: externalid
parameters.description: your external room id may set here

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: details of the room to be created if not found

200.description: id of the room or error code

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description: Lists all users in the system!

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

post.description:
Adds a new User like through the Frontend, but also does activates the
 Account To do SSO see the methods to create a hash and use those ones!

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

confirm.description: whatever or not to send email, leave empty for auto-send

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

post.description:
Sets the SessionObject for a certain SID, after setting this
 Session-Object you can use the SID + a RoomId to enter any Room. ...
 Session-Hashs are deleted 15 minutes after the creation if not used.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

get.description: Login and create sessionId required for sub-sequent calls

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: login or email of Openmeetings user with admin or SOAP-rights

parameters.name: pass
parameters.description: password

200.description: ServiceResult with error code or SID and userId

parameters.name: sid

parameters.name: externaltype
parameters.description: externalUserId

parameters.name: externalid
parameters.description: externalType

200.description: id of user deleted, or error code

500.description: Error in case of invalid credentials or server error

delete.description: Delete a certain user by its id

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: The SID of the User. This SID must be marked as Loggedin

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the openmeetings user id
